resources.string: You have successfully completed the treasure hunt!

During the app, the admin will be able to monitor your progress through the treasure hunt. 

This will involve the admin being able to track your current location, your location data will be wiped from the database once you logout of the app. 

They will no longer be able to track you after this point. Do you agree to allow the admin to use your location data?
The team tracker is where all of the participating teams and their progress are listed. \n\nHere, you can edit and manage all participating teams.
To delete multiple teams at once, simply press SELECT and select the teams you wish to delete. \n\nThen press DELETE.
To add a new team, select ADD TEAM and fill in the relevant information.

The admin map tracks the location of all teams in addition to the locations of all gems that are to found. 

The small blue circles represent the participating teams. 

The purple gems indicate where the unfound treasure lies.
By pressing \'management\', you are able to see the current treasure hunts that have been made and are taking place.
To create a treasure hunt, simply press CREATE NEW TREASURE HUNT and provide a title and the date you would like the hunt to go live. \n\nThen select ADD.
To be able to add treasure hunt locations, hold down where you would like to place the a new gem location.
Provide the location with a title, an index and a short description.
To edit a gem location, hold down the gem you would like to edit and change the information as desired.

On the management page, you can view the QR codes assigned to each treasure hunt. \n\nHold down one of the treasure hunts, and you will be presented with the option to edit a hunt, view its QR codes or delete it.
If you select QR Codes, you will be able to see the names of that treasure hunt\'s gem locations and view their QR codes.
